official_name: AICTE Saksham Scholarship Scheme for Specially-Abled Students
introduction: Saksham is a MHRD Scheme being implemented by AICTE aimed at providing encouragement and support to specially-abled children to pursue technical education.

eligibility_criteria.academic_requirements: Admitted to First year of Degree/Diploma level course in AICTE approved Institution

scholarship_benefits.description: Amount is provided for every year of study.
